query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
1 Già era l’angel dietro a noi rimaso, 2 l’angel che n’avea vòlti al sesto giro, 3 avendomi dal viso un colpo raso;
query.error: **English:** 1 Now the angel had remained behind us, 2 the angel who had turned us to the sixth round, 3 having brushed a stroke from my face;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
4 e quei c’hanno a giustizia lor disiro 5 detto n’avea beati, e le sue voci 6 con ‘sitiunt’, sanz’ altro, ciò forniro.
query.error: **English:** 4 and those who have their desire for justice 5 he had called blessed, and his words 6 with ‘they thirst’, without anything else, completed that.
query.result: 4 Ye ca sva-icchām nyāyārthe kurvanti 5 Tān abravīt subhagān, tasya ca vacaḥ 6 ‘Pibanti’ iti, anyena vinā, tat pūrṇam cakāra.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
7 E io più lieve che per l’altre foci 8 m’andava, sì che sanz’ alcun labore 9 seguiva in sù li spiriti veloci;
query.error: **English:** 7 And I, lighter than through the other circles, 8 went on, so that without any labor 9 I followed the swift spirits upward;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
16 mia benvoglienza inverso te fu quale 17 più strinse mai di non vista persona, 18 sì ch’or mi parran corte queste scale.
query.error: **English:** 16 my goodwill toward you was such 17 as never bound closer two persons who had not seen each other, 18 so that now these stairs seem short to me.
query.result: 16 Mama tava prati snehaḥ tādṛśaḥ ājātaḥ āsīt 17 Yathā adṛṣṭapuruṣayoḥ madhye api adhikaḥ sambhavati, 18 Yasmāt etāḥ śreṇyaḥ mama laghvyaḥ pratibhānti.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
19 Ma dimmi, e come amico mi perdona 20 se troppa sicurtà m’allarga il freno, 21 e come amico omai meco ragiona:
query.error: **English:** 19 But tell me, and as a friend forgive me 20 if too much assurance loosens my rein, 21 and as a friend now reason with me:
query.result: 19 Api tu mama sakhā asi, mama kṣamasva, 20 yadi ati viśvāsaḥ praśamayati mama lagāmaṃ, 21 mama sakhā asi, mama saha yuktiं kuru:

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
22 come poté trovar dentro al tuo seno 23 loco avarizia, tra cotanto senno 24 di quanto per tua cura fosti pieno?».
query.error: **English:** 22 how could avarice find a place within your breast, 23 amidst so much wisdom, 24 of which through your care you were so full?
query.result: 22 katham tava hṛdaye lobhaḥ sthānaṃ prāptavān, 23 itīye bahu jñāne sati, 24 yena tava paricaryayā pūrṇaḥ āsīḥ?

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
25 Queste parole Stazio mover fenno 26 un poco a riso pria; poscia rispuose: 27 «Ogne tuo dir d’amor m’è caro cenno.
query.error: **English:** 25 These words made Statius move 26 a little to laughter; then he replied: 27 "Every word you say of love is a dear sign to me.
query.result: 25 Etāni vacāṃsi Śtātyo cakāra 26 Alpaṃ hasitam pūrvam; paścāt pratyāha: 27 "Sarvaṃ tava kathanaṃ premaṇaḥ priyaṃ lakṣaṇam asti mama."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
28 Veramente più volte appaion cose 29 che danno a dubitar falsa matera 30 per le vere ragion che son nascose.
query.error: **English:** 28 Truly, many times things appear 29 that give false material for doubt 30 because of the true reasons that are hidden.
query.result: 28 Satyam, anekaśaḥ prakāśante vastūni 29 Yāni mithyā jñānam janayanti 30 Nimittāt satyānāṃ guhyānāṃ.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
31 La tua dimanda tuo creder m’avvera 32 esser ch’i’ fossi avaro in l’altra vita, 33 forse per quella cerchia dov’ io era.
query.error: **English:** 31 Your question confirms your belief 32 that I was miserly in my former life, 33 perhaps because of that circle in which I was.
query.result: 31 Tava praśnaḥ tava viśvāsam satyakaroti 32 mama pūrvajanmani lobhagrastaḥ āsītīti, 33 sambhavatas tasya maṇḍalasya yatra aham āsīt.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.error: **English:** 34 Now know that avarice was driven away 35 too much from me, and this immoderation 36 thousands of moons have punished.
query.result: 34 Atha jānīhi yad artha-lobhaḥ pravrajitaḥ 35 Atiriktaḥ mayā, ayam atiyogaḥ 36 Sahasra-candra-gaṇair danditaḥ.

query.prompt:

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.result: 46 Kevalaṃ katham udeti keśārdha-dagdhāḥ 47 avidyayā, yā asmāt pāpāt 48 jīvanto ’pi prāyaścittam apaharati ca ante ca!
